name: places/ChIJEQ5HVYlYwokR5Ls7nre3bnI
formattedAddress: 313 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 313 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
Avoid at all costs. After spending just shy of $9k on 4 shades we’ve been left with nothing working. Despite numerous measuring appointments the first set of shades were completely the wrong size. Delia begrudgingly remade them - after yet another re-measure. The second set? As bad as the first. So bad in fact the installer couldn’t hang all 4. Of the 3 he did manage to hang, one came crashing down about a week later - luckily not on someone’s head.

After hearing this Delia pushed us off to a customer care team who have done nothing but cancel appointments. No one has offered any compensation or even a sincere apology for the disaster of a job this has been - though they have promised to re-make the shades a 3rd time.

Long story short - work with professionals who care about the job and doing it right. These people clearly aren’t.

originalText.text: Avoid, what a waste of money and time. After 8 months and over $13k we’re still sleeping with eyeshades on with zero compensation or apology for our frustration. The design process with Danielle was awful: multiple iterations, I thought our parameters were very clear, but each time when approving the design, a real blocker would come up that Danielle had failed to mention earlier, like the window wouldn’t open, or this doesn’t come in blackout even though it was our P0. Just awful. Then the wait to receive the blinds in the mail after which you self schedule the installation (so more waiting, about 2-3 weeks). Three blinds were manufactured wrong, another 2 installed the wrong way around, and another had the wrong chain color (sounds silly but they make you pick the metal and if one blind arrives with the wrong color of this metal, it stands out). So more waiting and sleeping with eyeshades. Blinds arrive, self schedule, more waiting. Then one blind stopped working. Self schedule the repair appointment, 3 week wait. They fix the knot in the string inside the blind, apparently, but the fix lasted only 4 days and this time the blind stopped working and came crashing down. At this point Danielle has moved on and is ignoring our emails so I have to call the store who refer us to customer service. Another appointment to fix even though I asked for a replacement given the previous failed fix. More waiting for the appointment, then the technician is not able to fix the blind and refers us to customer service. More phone calls and waiting. Another appointment to “pick up the blind”, it is now apparently in Florida being fixed with no ETA when it will arrive and be reinstalled. I assume more waiting. They sent a replacement paper blind in the meantime but it’s the wrong size so only partially covers the window and we need to sleep with eyeshades. Zero accountability, no following up on the promises made over the phone (like replace not fix the blind, like update the email thread so we have a written record of where we are, like expedite the process). I feel completely defeated, I have no trust once the blind arrives it will not break again. The product seems so flimsy (the string specifically) that I’m expecting the other blinds to stop working at some point too. When they do I will probably just cut my losses and redo the window treatments with a better company- I’ve decided to write this review so others don’t have to go through this.

originalText.text: We worked with Paisley Shaler of The Shade Store’s Upper West Side location. Paisley was extremely helpful, had thorough product knowledge, and guided us to options that suited our needs – even staying after hours to make sure we were provided with samples and able to make our selection. We outfitted a living room window with motorized solar and blackout shades and could not be more pleased with the result and the quality of the work and materials. We had a minor issue with the installers who were unable to arrive on the scheduled installation day, but upon notifying The Shade Store customer service, the installation company immediately contacted us to resolve and communication throughout the process was excellent. We were impressed by The Shade Store’s resolution, professionalism, and customer service. In particular, Paisley Shaler, Stephanie Martinez and Jacklyn Decker in Customer Care, and Mayra of M&N Installation were very helpful and we recommend them without reservation to anyone looking for beautiful, professionally-installed window treatments.

originalText.text: The Shade Store made the process of ordering and installing so easy! Kate was so friendly from the second we walked in the store, showing us different options of materials and curtain tracks, and helping decide what would work best for our budget and needs. We changed our minds several times before finally deciding on a final product and she was so patient throughout the process, providing different quotes each time. The timing from delivery to installation was also super quick, and the installer came and put the tracks up very efficiently and with no issues. We are doing various renovations in our apartment and the customer service from The Shade Store has surpassed the rest of the vendors and companies we've been working with by a mile, from start to finish. I will definitely look to use them again for future projects!

originalText.text:
Beth Israel from this Shade Store location was fantastic! While the previous salesperson I worked with at this location transferred to a different Shade Store, Beth still took the time to look up my previous order and make note of my preferences for our first meeting.

When I arrived at the Shade Store, she took me through each decision I needed to make, and did not pressure me at all to pick one style or another. She understood the look and feel I was going through, and we went through the whole ordering process in an efficient manner.

She set an installation date for me, and helped me get a COI for my co-op managing agent.

The installer was very friendly, and the shades I ordered for three windows were installed in less than 30 minutes. The Shade Store is simply the best. They take care of everything from start to finish, and sent a professional to measure each aspect of your windows. I could not be happier with Beth and The Shade Store.
